en.deemedApprovedAppStatusMsg: Your ‘deemed service’ application has been approved
en.deemedApprovedAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service' that your {{ divorceWho }} received the divorce application.
en.deemedApprovedAppStatusMsgDetails2: You can now continue with the next stage and apply for a decree nisi.
